19.textMFS: <VL<H<T'In the construction below, will the perpendicular bisector of '><SS2<O2<T'AB'>>><T' go through '><SS2<T'P '>><T'?'>><H<T'To answer this question, first use the '><SW2<T'PBT Converse'>><T' tool to check whether '><SS2<T'PA = PB'>><T'.'>><T'How does the result from this tool help you answer the original question?'>>

23.textMFS: <VL<T'Use the other tools to construct a segment, its perpendicular bisector, and segments from the'><T'endpoints of the first segment to the same point on the perpendicular bisector.'><T'Measure these last two segments; what do you notice about the measurements?'><T'Use what you know about the reflect function to explain why this result must be true.'><F1FxxFFFFFFFFx20x8x>>
